title: OMIGOD: Critical Vulnerabilities in OMI Affecting Countless Azure Customers
summary: Wiz Research recently found 4 critical vulnerabilities in OMI, which is one of Azure's most ubiquitous yet least known software agents and is deployed on a large portion of Linux VMs in Azure.

title: “Secret” Agent Exposes Azure Customers To Unauthorized Code Execution
summary: Wiz Research recently discovered a series of alarming vulnerabilities that highlight the supply chain risk of open source code, particularly for customers of cloud computing services.
